overview: A young girl is forced to give up college when her father loses all his money. She soon meets and falls for a young man at a party, only to discover that he's married. As if that weren't bad enough, he is soon seriously injured in an automobile accident, and doctors say that he may never walk again.
tagline: The situation was critical. His wife and the woman he loved, not being one and the same person, could hardly be expected to enjoy it.
title: Broken Barriers
